Method Detail

sendEmail

public static void sendEmail(java.lang.String host,
                             java.lang.String port,
                             java.lang.String from,
                             java.lang.String to,
                             java.lang.String cc,
                             java.lang.String bcc,
                             java.lang.String subject,
                             java.lang.String message,
                             boolean html)
                      throws javax.mail.MessagingException
Send an email through vorta with the following attributes.

Parameters:
host - Email host
from - From line in email
to - To line in email
cc - CC line in email (can be null)
bcc - BCC line in email (can be null)
subject - Subject of email
message - body of email
html - flag as to whether message is in HTML format or raw text
Throws:
javax.mail.MessagingException

sendEmail

public static void sendEmail(java.lang.String from,
                             java.lang.String to,
                             java.lang.String subject,
                             java.lang.String message,
                             boolean html)
                      throws javax.mail.MessagingException
Send an email through vorta with the following attributes. This uses "vorta" as the default host and "25" as the default port.

Parameters:
from - From line in email
to - To line in email
subject - Subject of email
message - body of email
Throws:
javax.mail.MessagingException

main

                 throws javax.mail.MessagingException
Throws:
javax.mail.MessagingException
